title: Important Update: MCA Portal Downtime for ROC/RD Restructuring
content:
# Important Update: MCA Portal Downtime for ROC/RD Restructuring

Ek important update hai. Government ne Registrar of Companies (ROC) aur Regional Director (RD) administrative restructuring ke liye MCA portal downtime announce kiya hai.

Yeh administrative restructuring Companies Act, 2013 ke तहत की जा रही है, jiska aim corporate governance ko strengthen karna aur ease of doing business ko improve karna hai.

*   **Portal Downtime:** Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) portal February 15, 2026, ko poore 24 ghante ke liye unavailable rahega.
*   **Reason for Downtime:** Yeh downtime naye jurisdiction structure ko smoothly roll out karne ke liye zaroori hai.
*   **Effective Date:** Naya ROC/RD administrative structure February 16, 2026, se effective ho jayega.
*   **Purpose of Restructuring:** Is restructuring ka uddeshya administrative efficiency badhana, processing delays kam karna, aur companies aur LLPs ke liye regional management ko behtar banana hai.
*   **Key Notifications:** Is restructuring ko initially Notification S.O. 4850(E) dated October 23, 2025, ke through notify kiya gaya tha. Iski effective date ko baad mein Notification S.O. 6112(E) dated December 30, 2025, dwara February 16, 2026, tak defer kar diya gaya tha.

Apne pending filings ko downtime se pehle complete kar lein.
